data.title: Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables
data.meta-description: Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables For Sale at American Surplus, In Stock, 1,100 lb. capacity, 24" x 36" platform, 36" lift height, nationwide shipping, visit our site for information on Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables

long-description.p: Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables For Sale at American Surplus are in stock. These lift tables are hydraulic operated and have casters for easy transport and manuevering. They have a 1,100 lb. capacity. Our Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables have a 24" x 36" platform and the lift height is 36" high. Speak with a member of our sales team to learn more about our Used Southworth A-500 Lift Tables we have to offer.

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used lift tables 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
